transcript:
Customer: Nahi hai beta.
Customer: 0.7 degree ka nikalte yaar.
Customer: Ha waise recording se daaliye. Hello.
Executive: Ha bolo.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Zakeer bhai, assalam walekum. Ashma baat kar rahi thi main IndiaMART se. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Aap offline achha kaam karoge but IndiaMART pe bhi aap all.
Executive: Bolo bolo madam.
Customer: Hello. Sir aapse do minute baat karni thi please.
Executive: Koshish kar rahi thi ki sir aapka kya.
Customer: Bolo na.
Customer: Sir aapke renewal ke liye Himani ke sath discussion chal raha tha. Kya hua kuch confirm nahi
hua abhi tak sir?
Executive: Aapka kahin had tak kuch.
Customer: Abhi kaha renewal karaya renewal karayenge na.
Executive: Time karwa sakte hain.
Customer: Ha sir usi ke liye puchh rahi hu. Kya problem aa raha abhi tak karaya kyu nahi aapne sir?
Customer: Abhi nahi karayenge next week mein karayenge.
Executive: Aapka plan hai koi IndiaMART ko.
Customer: Next week mein lekin next week aapko bataya hoga na Himani ne sare naye prices milenge fir aapko.
Executive: Aapki lead.
Customer: Abhi karoge to abhi aapko discount offer mil raha hai sir. Old price mil raha hai abhi.
Customer: Hongi sir wo best hongi.
Customer: Aapne dekha hoga pichhle pehle humne aapko 65000 plus ek saal ka bataya tha.
Customer: Abhi wahi 65000 ek 75 ka 76000 ka ho gaya sir.
Executive: Call karna mujhe.
Customer: Aap mujhe batao main kitni der mein aapko call back kar lu sir?
Executive: Se baat nahi kar pa rahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not renewed subscription yet.



Resolution:

- Executive inquired about renewal and discount offers.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will renew next week.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, subscription, discount
